channel.title: How do I change some things in my client?
channel.description:
Okay need some help plz...
First thing, How do I change my loading bar colour in my client???
Second thing, How do I change my background picture in my client??
Thanks to everyone who helped[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 03:22:15 PM[/size][hr]help any1??

item.title: How do I change some things in my client?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Client.java maybe?(in the client folder)
Just search one of the words - like ‘animations’

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change some things in my client?
item.dc:creator: @Lost1 Lost!
item.description:
@Lost1 wrote:

type:

loadingbarchangepl0x = 1;

then the 1 is your colour

now fuck off
